title: Identify the Phase Change
text: Look at the heating curve and identify where the phase change from liquid to gas occurs.

title: Locate the Plateau
text: Find the plateau on the graph where the temperature remains constant during the phase change from liquid to gas.

title: Read the Temperature
text: Read the temperature value on the y-axis that corresponds to the plateau for the vaporization phase change.

title: Check the Units
text: Ensure that the temperature is read in degrees Celsius as indicated on the y-axis of the graph.

title: Determine the Temperature of Vaporization
text: What is the temperature at the plateau where the substance changes from liquid to gas?
